data: {"concept_id": "beats", "concept_name": "Beats (come first)", "type": "element", "definition": "Smallest unit of meaningful change that flips power, knowledge, emotion, or options.", "scope_notes": "Use beats to move a moment; stack beats to build scenes. Track Before→After in a breath.", "axes": "function|intensity", "axis_values": "action|reaction|decision|revelation | 1|2|3", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "pacing|tension|POV|setting", "conflicts_with": "dead_beats|jumbled_order|overwritten_beats", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_beats_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_beats_weak_*", "source_file": "Beats come first.md", "source_md5": "2a9c2e02f60f80b85af7970197f0144b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:56:14.490488Z"}

{"concept_id": "beats", "signal_id": "sig_action", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "action", "description": "Visible external change: doors, objects, bodies alter options.", "detection_hint": "Look for verbs that change state (open, break, block).", "false_positive_risks": "Decorative motion that leaves state unchanged.", "minimal_example": "You flip the latch; the gate swings.", "counterexample": "You touch the latch; nothing is different."}

{"concept_id": "beats", "signal_id": "sig_reaction", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "reaction", "description": "Body/mind shift made visible without emotion labels.", "detection_hint": "Physiology or behavior changes: breath, grip, timing, glance.", "false_positive_risks": "Abstract emotion words with no observable cue.", "minimal_example": "Your laugh stops before it lands.", "counterexample": "You feel sad."}

{"concept_id": "beats", "signal_id": "sig_decision", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "decision", "description": "Choice closes one path and opens another.", "detection_hint": "Look for irreversible selection or cost attached to a choice.", "false_positive_risks": "Waffling or ‘deciding’ without any downstream effect.", "minimal_example": "You leave the gun; you take the cash.", "counterexample": "You consider your options."}

{"concept_id": "beats", "signal_id": "sig_revelation", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "revelation", "description": "New information reframes what came before.", "detection_hint": "Detail that changes meaning of prior lines.", "false_positive_risks": "Trivia that doesn’t alter stakes or aim.", "minimal_example": "The key fits your lock.", "counterexample": "You notice a random sticker."}

{"concept_id": "beats", "signal_id": "sig_patterns_domino", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "", "description": "Domino chain: Beat A causes B causes C.", "detection_hint": "Causal links; each beat removes/creates options.", "false_positive_risks": "Sequence without causality.", "minimal_example": "Alarm shrieks → smoke crawls → you drop low.", "counterexample": "Three unrelated actions in a row."}

{"concept_id": "beats", "signal_id": "sig_patterns_pressure", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "", "description": "Pressure cooker: multiple beats intensify one tension.", "detection_hint": "Yes-but / No-and escalation.", "false_positive_risks": "Repetition without increased cost.", "minimal_example": "You try; door sticks; alarm starts; key snaps.", "counterexample": "You try the same thing three times with no change."}

{"concept_id": "beats", "signal_id": "sig_patterns_switcheroo", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "", "description": "Expectation flips in a reveal.", "detection_hint": "Seed → misread → reframe beat.", "false_positive_risks": "Twist with no setup.", "minimal_example": "You tuck the blanket; she says ‘Don’t go’… to the dog."}

{"concept_id": "beats", "misconception_id": "dead_beats", "description": "Lines that change nothing (decorative action or emotion label).", "tells": "Sighing, looking, walking with no consequence; adjectives instead of turns.", "likely_causes": "Confusing description with change.", "corrective_feedback": "Tie each action to an effect. Ask: Before→After? Who pays?", "micro_drill": "Take 3 decorative lines and add a cost or a consequence."}

{"concept_id": "beats", "misconception_id": "jumbled_order", "description": "Reaction appears before its cause; camera feels miscut.", "tells": "Emotion precedes trigger; justification appears post hoc.", "likely_causes": "Drafting out of sequence.", "corrective_feedback": "Order default: Action → Reaction → Decision → Revelation. Break only on purpose.", "micro_drill": "Rewrite one paragraph to restore causal order."}

{"concept_id": "beats", "misconception_id": "overwritten_beats", "description": "Five sentences where five words would cut deeper.", "tells": "Long verb chains; over-explained emotion.", "likely_causes": "Fear the reader won’t ‘get it’.", "corrective_feedback": "Compress to the hinge moment. Keep only what flips the state.", "micro_drill": "Reduce a 4-line beat to 1–2 sharp sentences."}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_beats_identify_function", "concept_id": "beats", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Label each line as Action, Reaction, Decision, or Revelation and justify with one observable signal.", "expected_features": "Correct function label; specific cue cited; causal or reframing effect named", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "All labels correct with precise signals; notes causal chain or reframe.", "Meets": "Mostly correct; basic justification.", "Developing": "Labels or justifications off; no change identified."}, "distractor_strategy": "Include decorative motion and emotion labels without change.", "hint_steps": "1) Underline the hinge word/action 2) Ask ‘Before→After?’ 3) Choose function", "variation_axes": "genre|pace|POV", "difficulty": 2}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_beats_build_run", "concept_id": "beats", "cognitive_goal": "compose", "task_type": "order", "prompt_template": "Arrange the shuffled lines into a coherent beat run using Domino, Pressure Cooker, or Switcheroo pattern.", "expected_features": "Causality or escalation present; clean flip or payoff; minimal filler", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Causal integrity + escalation + sharp switch.", "Meets": "Readable sequence with some cause/effect.", "Developing": "List-like; little causality."}, "distractor_strategy": "Include lines that reset to zero or break causality.", "hint_steps": "1) Find the trigger 2) Track cost 3) Place the flip/payoff", "variation_axes": "tension|genre", "difficulty": 3}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_beats_fix_dead", "concept_id": "beats", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "Replace decorative lines with beats that create visible change or cost.", "expected_features": "Added consequence or choice; observable shift; concise language", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Each fix adds a hinge and carries forward.", "Meets": "Most fixes add some change.", "Developing": "Changes remain decorative."}, "distractor_strategy": "Decorative gestures and abstract labels.", "hint_steps": "1) Name the missing change 2) Add cost or choice 3) Cut leftovers", "variation_axes": "stakes|setting", "difficulty": 2}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_beats_order_repair", "concept_id": "beats", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Reorder a scrambled paragraph to restore Action→Reaction→Decision→Revelation flow.", "expected_features": "Cause precedes effect; reaction grounded; decision alters options; revelation reframes", "scoring_method": "pattern", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Clean causal chain with tight prose.", "Meets": "Mostly causal; minor roughness.", "Developing": "Cause/effect still muddled."}, "distractor_strategy": "Tempting but premature reactions or reveals.", "hint_steps": "1) Identify trigger 2) Anchor body shift 3) Commit choice 4) Land the reframe", "variation_axes": "pace", "difficulty": 2}

{"example_id": "ex_beats_1", "concept_id": "beats", "axis_value": "", "label": "strong", "text": "You knock. The door is already unlocked.", "context_tags": "thriller|door", "source_file": "Beats come first.md", "source_md5": "2a9c2e02f60f80b85af7970197f0144b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:56:14.490488Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_beats_2", "concept_id": "beats", "axis_value": "", "label": "strong", "text": "You hand her the mug; your fingers stay.", "context_tags": "romance|gesture", "source_file": "Beats come first.md", "source_md5": "2a9c2e02f60f80b85af7970197f0144b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:56:14.490488Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_beats_3", "concept_id": "beats", "axis_value": "", "label": "strong", "text": "He says, “Call it.” You count exits.", "context_tags": "tension|coin_toss", "source_file": "Beats come first.md", "source_md5": "2a9c2e02f60f80b85af7970197f0144b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:56:14.490488Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_beats_4", "concept_id": "beats", "axis_value": "", "label": "strong", "text": "You slide the envelope across; you don’t let go.", "context_tags": "negotiation", "source_file": "Beats come first.md", "source_md5": "2a9c2e02f60f80b85af7970197f0144b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:56:14.490488Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_beats_5", "concept_id": "beats", "axis_value": "", "label": "strong", "text": "You tuck the blanket; she says, “Don’t go.” … to the dog.", "context_tags": "switcheroo|humor", "source_file": "Beats come first.md", "source_md5": "2a9c2e02f60f80b85af7970197f0144b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:56:14.490488Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_beats_weak_1", "concept_id": "beats", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "You sighed and looked out the window.", "context_tags": "decorative", "source_file": "Beats come first.md", "source_md5": "2a9c2e02f60f80b85af7970197f0144b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:56:14.490488Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_beats_weak_2", "concept_id": "beats", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "You felt sad.", "context_tags": "label", "source_file": "Beats come first.md", "source_md5": "2a9c2e02f60f80b85af7970197f0144b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:56:14.490488Z"}
